name: New Deal Cocktail
instruction: Stir and serve in a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Pete Petiot, Bartender, St. Regis Hotel, New York, U.S.A.

name: New Orleans Gin Fizz
instruction: Shake well for two minutes. Strain into a tumbler and fill with soda.
note: A popular drink in the Southern States of America.

name: Night-Cap
instruction: Shake well and strain into a small wineglass.

name: Nineteenth Hole Cocktail
instruction: Stir well and serve in a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Charles V. Wheeler, Washington, D.C.

name: Nineteen-Twenty Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nineteen-Twenty Pick-me-up
instruction: Shake well, strain into a wineglass, and fill with soda.

name: Normandie Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Charlie Soumille, New York Bar, Paris.

name: N.R.A. Cooler
instruction: Shake well, strain into a large tumbler, and fill with ginger ale.
note: Recipe by 'Mac', New York Bar, Paris.
